name: Verify Neuros Terminal Discovery and Access
description: Validates that the Neuros terminal appears in the cockpit upon entering region 0b and can be accessed correctly.
testObjective: Ensure the Neuros terminal is discoverable and interactive in region 0b.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player has completed hibernation from intro region
Player has navigated to the cockpit

steps.action: Look to the left side of the cockpit
steps.expected: Neuros terminal is visible and appears as a new terminal type not present in previous regions

steps.action: Approach the Neuros terminal until interaction prompt appears
steps.expected: Interaction prompt appears indicating [E] or [LMB] to interact

steps.action: Press [E] or click [LMB] on the Neuros terminal
steps.expected: CLI tool interface opens on the terminal screen

postconditions: CLI interface is active and ready for input
